articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Patriots-Packers preseason game called off after injury to Isaiah Bolden - The Guardian
articles.description: New England’s preseason game with Green Bay was called off on Saturday night after Patriots rookie cornerback Isaiah Bolden was carted off the field
articles.content:
New Englands preseason game with the Green Bay Packers was called off on Saturday night after Patriots rookie cornerback Isaiah Bolden was carted off the field early in the fourth quarter.
Bolden, a… [+2607 chars]
